package.name: XenStatus
package.shortDescription: This is a Tunnel of Light HS and LS Wallpaper!

descriptionlist.description: This is a Tunnel of Light HS and LS Wallpaper!
It's available for both HS and LS!
Please do move the wallpaper around a bit when applying via XenHTML to fit the screen. It won't be hard.

video.source: Your browser does not support HTML5 video.
